participant_1.name: Mark

participant_1.background: i'm 40 years old. i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and cheerful, always looking for joy in life despite current troubles.
participant_2.background: i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i love eating out with friends. my favorite singer is taylor swift. i am 24 years old. i'm getting married in the spring.

content.text: hey there , i do believe we never met . .
a little bummed at the moment .
